text: Hey Christophe — Just wanted to check back in with you — I suspect that your work computer has some firewall or security settings that is preventing the CLI from making these fetches/connections. If this is something that you can maybe bring up within your work org, that might yield some information. Either confirming that it is the case — and whether or not something can be done about it.

Hi Tanya, thanks for checking back! I have contacted my company's IT department to see if I can test the CLI after disabling the firewall and/or other security systems, but I haven't heard back yet. I'll definitely post an update after the test.
